name: tokens_all
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool defi_watch.
Tool description: DeFi Watch's API opens access to up-to-date data for thousands of cryptocurrencies. The API code is clear, developer-friendly, and provides daily and historical cryptocurrency information for each API request
API description: Fetches data about tokens and optionally filters the results based on provided parameters.

take.description: Select how much fields should take

walletid.description: Identifier for a specific wallet to filter tokens by.

searchterms.description: Terms to search for within the token data.

chains.description: Specific blockchains to filter tokens by.

skip.description: The number of fields to skip before starting to take.

ids.description: Specific token IDs to retrieve data for.
